romaye pihiti shri lanka thanapathi karyalaye sidu wi thibena mulya wanchawata sambandha niladharin dedenama me wana wita kolambaata kandawa thibena bawa ithaliye shri lanka thanapathi hemantha warnakulasuriya mahatha pawasayi.thama thanapathi karyalaye mulya katayuthu sambandhayen kriya karanuye chansariye pradhaniya wana athara eeta amathara wa pariwara niladhariyada eeta sahaya wana bawa hethema awadharanaya karayi.me niladhariya ayatha lesa mudal pariharanaya kara athi bawath atham awasthawaladi ee pudgalaya pitasthara pudgalayan wetha poliyata mudal laba di thibena bawatath thorathuru labi thibena athara me niladhariyagen kala prashna kirime di ewakata wada balu chansariye pradhaniyata likhithawa me bawa danwa siti bawata prakasha kara athayi da thanapathiwaraya pawasuwe ya.eheth chansariye pradhaniyata ewani niyogayak nolabunu bawath enisama thibunu aakarayenma mudal pawathwagena giya bawata thama wetha danum dun bawath ki hemantha warnakulasuriya mahatha me siduwima sambandhayen ewakata widesha amathiwarayawa siti rohitha bogollagama mahatha wetha likhithawa paminili kota wahama kriyathmaka wana lesa illa siti bawada ee mahatha kiya.thawada ewakata widesha lekamwa siti aacharya palitha kohona mahathagenda amathyanshaye abhyanthara wiganana baladharin pirisak romayata ewana lesa illa siti bawath ee mahatha ge thanathura wenas wimen widesha lekam lesa path wu romesh jayasinha mahathagen da ema illima kala bawath ithaliye shri lanka thanapathiwaraya kiya siti.me mulya wanchawa sambandhayen soya balimata idiripath wu widesha katayuthu amathyanshaye pradhana ganakadhikari ke. di. ranjith ha abhyanthara wiganana anshaye adhayaksha je. em. liyanage mahathwarunata thama pranamaya pirinamana bawa pawasana ee mahatha me niladhariya thanapathi karyalayata labunu mudal banku gatha nokara ohu wisin pariharanaya kara athi bawata parikshanawalin soya gath bawada kiya.me mudal ayatha lesa parihanaye purna wagakima mema pariwara niladhariyata pamanak nowa 2007 sita thanapathi karyalaye sewaya kala chansari pradhaniyatada pawariya yuthu bawath podu depala panatha yatathe nadu pawariya haki bawath hemantha warnakulasuriya mahatha sandahan karayi.thawada ee mahatha kiya sitinne rajayata ha rate janathawata aadaraya karana janathawage thorathuruwalin me mudal wanchawa soya ganimata haki wu bawath ee thorathuru matha kriyathmaka nowuna nam me wanchawa thawaduratath sidu karagena yana bawath hethema wadiduratath kiya siti..
